issues_reports.text: @Tracfone How about my account number so I can switch to the other carrier. You don't put my account number anywhere on the site from what I can tell and I need it so I can move my number over to @Mintmobile because I'm sick of the absurd rates you charge for terrible service

@zhinxy_vs_media Still mostly do. I live in a wireless dead zone and work from home, and when I go into town I just want to get my business over with. I guess I should get some minutes for my old tracfone in case of an emergency.
@Tracfone your customer service sucks. You guys authorized a payment on an account that my card is not authorized for.

Hey @Tracfone 
Why does there seem to be no live chat even though your help system says there's a live chat?

TRACFONE
I am telling everyone NOT to go to Tracfone
When you have a Problem, there is NO one there to a help you.
They give you a Link to Online Chat, then once you get there, there is NO link
There is a Phone number to call, when you call this number, a damn computer
Samsung phones for TracFone & StraightTalk plans internet connection are akin to having cable in 1980s. You never know if you'll have connection.

I was told yesterday my phone would be here tomorrow or Saturday. 
Now I'm told my phone will be here on September30th
@Tracfone you are not doing too well right now with me. Worst customer service. 
I was lied to
@x_dubs Yes!!! and I’m mad AF about it. 9pm hit and this **** turns into a tracfone😒

After the miracle with the Tracfone I said ok Jesus I don’t understand but if she said she talked to me in NYC who am I to say she’s a liar 

At the time she didn’t know she was pregnant. She just needed help paying for her cap and gown
My dad’s friend gave him a Tracfone. Now my dad is getting my mom one. I’m glad they are ditching their super old phones (like old flip phones) but these phones are crap.

@Verizon So, how long did I have no cell service last night? 1X signal quickly followed by "Emergency Calls Only" on primary and backup TracFone that uses Verizon around 0200 CDT, same until I restarted my phone around 0530.
Your customer service is ****, too, @Tracfone! If someone needs to chat with you online, the least you could do is acknowledge their existence. Good grief!

@Tracfone Why is Tracfone Customer Service so terrible? Are you having trouble staffing? I know that's happening with a lot of companies. I can't even get the status of my ticket (1240935786). Is anyone still working there?

Another day goes by, another day @TracFone fails to have a person who knows *ANYTHING* about their web site talk to me.  Do they like having terrible customer service?  Do they like having customers trash them on Twitter?  Do they like being known as:

#TracFoneSucks?

I guess so
Having a difficult time with Tracfone. Have spent weeks and hours of air time trying to activate phone. Only thing that was done was my # of 14 YEARS was changed. i need help!
@Tracfone It sucks that you're a bot... That link does not actually bring up a chat.

issues_reports.user: The myth. The legend. The dumbass.
issues_reports.text: Canceled my Tracfone auto-refill. My phone is no longer reading the SIM card anymore, it keeps saying no SIM card.. I've done all of the ways to fix it.
@montaga @TMobile @Verizon tracfone--was with sprint/t mobile for almost 20 years.  would never use a major carrier again.

SUBMIT or SEND. No way to Send the email. It vanished. I went to Twitter. My ZTE wouldn't let me tweet: horrid Gboard acting up. Had to tweet on Samsung. Both these androids will be retired from TracFone. No more lousy service plans from TracFone. But, after I ranted, sent,

Why would @TracFone have a web site if they don't know how it works?  Why do they have "customer service" if those people don't know anything about their own web site?  WTF is wrong with @TracFone?

Yeah, #TracFoneSucks

@Weatheronthe8s This! I don’t know why so many people look at TracFone as cheap and simple.
They use the ATT network, right?
@AskStraightTalk Hey can I get some help? I wanted to know if my locked tracfone will work on your network?

My Tracfone # I had for a couple days was in her contacts

@Tracfone Well, you're doing a **** job because you get zero customer service satisfaction from me.
Oh yeah, @TracFone still sucks
@Tracfone I've talked to support serval times and not got anywhere. I keep getting told my account numer is my IMEI, but mint says its wrong, so IDK what support is gonna do

@AnnieSage I bought a Tracfone from HSN in July. The speaker stopped working. Their site would not let me leave a review. I called 2 times. Couldn't bring myself to be rude to the tired sounding phone reps. We are all doing our best.

Tracfone's commercial is just terribly constructed. Brats go bad - they're perishable, meaning they exactly are like minutes that expire.

Bad writing.
